short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Audio Controller for all twitch streams currently opened on the Chrome window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch Audio Controller adds a new way to manage the volume and balance of all twitch streams currently open on the chrome window. Do you want to listen to a background music stream while watching you favorite streamer? We got you
